title: IView.IGetVisibleEntities2
description: Gets the visible entities of the specified type for the specified component in this drawing view.
signature:
Entity IGetVisibleEntities2( 
   Component2
LpViewComponent
,
   System.Int32
EntityType
,
   System.Int32
ViewEntityCount
)

parameters.name: LpViewComponent
parameters.description: Component from which to get EntityType

parameters.name: EntityType
parameters.description: Type of entity as defined in swViewEntityType_e

parameters.name: ViewEntityCount
parameters.description: Number of visible entities of EntityType in LpViewComponent

returns: In-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of visible entities VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Visible entities are entities that are not completely obscured by other entities in the view.
Call
IView::GetVisibleEntityCount2
before calling this method to get the value of ViewEntityCount.
The difference between this method and the now obsolete IView::IGetVisibleEntities method is that this method supports silhouette edges (EntityType = swViewEntityType_e.swViewEntityType_SilhouetteEdge).
